name: Slot Revolution
description: Travel to a world of fantasy filled with powerful creatures and ageless magic in this addicting slot machine-based, role-playing experience! Do you have what it takes to turn back the tide of blood that threatens your once peaceful world? Become a Warrior, Ranger, or Wizard, each with different skills and abilities! Join forces with friends and allies to take advantage of strength in numbers and leap into action to defeat enemies, earn gold, and find new gear and equipment.

name: Casino League
description: Casino League is a full tournament-style game with different tournament tiers where players can fight for Bronze, Silver, and Gold placings in each tier. The game features tournament-style live Texas Hold ‘Em with either 2-player head-to-head battle or 4-player gameplay.

name: Bounce Back
description:
Bounce Back Java Game
Bounce game with different levels

The legendary game Bounce is back! The game is funny and fascinating. The game is supported not only by Nokia, but also by other mobile phones!

name: Mazie
description:
Mazie is fast bat 'n' ball action with more fascinating features than you can shake a joystick at. For a start, you don't just fire at the bricks - they fire at you. Avalanches of bombs will wing their way toward you, the dreaded Yello will descend from jets flying over, and the red devil tumbles from its cage. All can have a seriously detrimental effect on your life! Then there are the capsules to be caught, some of which can give you a larger bat, or a plank over part of the holy grass, or a free life, or even a wipe screen.

36 screens with a more difficult big bonus version of each and every one - that's the marvel of Mazie.

name: AR Studio for The Playroom
description:
Ever wanted to have your own movie studio? Then AR Studio is for you.

Use your tablet or smartphone to create funky banners and holographic billboards, wear funny masks, add your own music and special effects and be the star of your own TV show. You could even start a regular broadcast, beamed directly to “Live From PlayStation”. What will your show be about?

name: Skyworld: Kingdom Brawl - Fresh Meat
description: A free update/DLC that adds five all-new maps for you to destroy your friends on and eight new units that introduce new tactics to the game such as the ability to heal units or to slow down the enemy by freezing them. Destroy your enemies like never before!

name: Sunder For People Who Don't Have Time To Play Sunder
description: Get the full Sunder experience in just a fraction of the time! All of the action, with only 10% of the average monster count! The maps range from a few minutes to 15-20 minutes ﻿long. ﻿Play it now, and next time you're at a party, you'll have just enough Sunder knowledge to impress everyone with your analysis of the combat encounters. ﻿﻿

name: Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid - Mega Edition
description:
The Mega Edition of Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid comes with:
- Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid physical game sealed in a standard case.
- Deluxe Morpher SteelBook with inset magnet recess.
- Five power coins that magnetically attach to the SteelBook Morpher
- 18 x 24 inch poster.
- Collector's Edition Content:
- Update One Content (v1.2):
- Update Two Content (v1.3):

name: Venom Vendetta
description: Venom Vendetta is a short single tech-base-themed mbf21 map for Doom2. The main focus was to make a map with a small monster count that could be quickly completed.

name: Shenmue III: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Palworld: Pokémon Mod
description: A mod for Palworld which changes many models from the game to Pokémon characters. It was taken down by Nintendo due to copyright infringement.

name: No-Skin
description: No-Skin is a roguelike game characterized by a horror atmosphere and a smooth yet complex gameplay. Face the horrors that the house hides behind every corner and discover who the No-Skin Man truly is!

name: Chesstempo
description: Welcome to Chess Tempo's Play Chess Online feature. You can play online chess against other site members, or against bots with a range of playing strengths. Both traditional and correspondence chess is supported, allowing you to play a quick chess game, or a correspondence game spanning many days or weeks.

name: Debate
description:
All debates are black and white, there is no middle ground, is there?
Debate is a simple game designed for parties and gatherings of friends, it simply gives you topics to debate and assigns you one side of the argument. You can't choose which side, the app will do it for you!

name: Atlantic '41
description:
Atlantic '41 is an upcoming World War 2 U-boat simulation for the Playdate console. Take command of a German submarine during the early years of the conflict and hunt convoys in the Atlantic and the Mediterranean.

Make sure you know your boat inside and out, take good care of your crew, and try to survive the war as the Allies develop better weapons and detection systems against the U-boat peril.

name: Super Mario 16: Land of Crisis
description: Super Mario 16: Land of Crisis is a romhack from longtime SMW hacker Alex No. This is his last romhack.

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Card e+ - 1UP Kinoko ga 3UP Moon ni Kawaru
description:
1UP Kinoko ga 3UP Moon ni kawaru! is a Japan-exclusive e-Reader card for use with Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3. It was released in Series 1 in Japan. It can be used in both the main game and in World-e. Its key art was orange and featured a red outline of Raccoon Mario, specifically him crouching with his tail extended.

Once it is scanned, all of the 1-Up Mushrooms in the game become 3-Up Moons. This feature allows Mario and Luigi to accumulate extra lives more easily.

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Card e+ - Luigi Power Up!
description: Luigi Power Up! is a Japan-exclusive e-Reader card in Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3. Released in Series 1 in Japan, it gives Luigi his scuttle ability from Super Mario Bros. 2 and makes his fireballs bounce higher, as in Super Mario World: Super Mario Advance 2. It can be used in the main game, and in World-e (although it is permanently on by default in World-e, without ever needing to scan the card).

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Card e+ - Timer Yukkuri!
description:
Timer yukkuri! is a Japan-exclusive e-Reader card that is used with Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3. It was included in the Series 2 set of cards. It can be used only in World-e. The key art is light green and featured an outline of Toad.

Once this card gets scanned, the timer and music slow down for the first 50 counts, giving the player more time to complete a level. When 50 counts are past, the "coin" sound is played and the timer and music go back to their original speeds.

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Card e+ - Sugu ni Mantan! Power Meter!!
description:
Sugu ni mantan! Power Meter!! is a Japan-exclusive e-Reader card for use with Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3. It was released in Series 2 in Japan. It can be used only in World-e. The key art, similar to the blue switch card, was colored orange with a red outline of Raccoon Mario. The only difference between the two cards is that Mario is facing upright and pointing his left finger.

Once this card is scanned, the Power Meter is halved, making it much easier to run and fly throughout stages.

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Card e+ - Teki Power Up! Tokuten x2!!
description:
Teki Power Up! Tokuten x2!! is a Japan-exclusive Series 2 e-Reader card that is used with Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3. It can be used in both the main game and in World-e. Its key artwork is dark green with a red outline of Bowser.

Once this card is scanned on the e-Reader, it makes all non-lethal damage power down the player to Small form (as in Super Mario Bros. and its derivatives, the Japanese version of Super Mario Bros. 3, and the original version of Super Mario World), replaces most of the enemies with more difficult ones (similar to the Hard Mode of Super Mario Bros.), and doubles the bosses' health. However, the points that the player receives are doubled, making the player's score accumulate much faster.

name: Danmaku Kentei Shiken: DaiOuJou-hen
description:
Speaking of Cave's shooting game, no matter what you say, it's a barrage!! But how good am I actually?

An app that answers that question is finally here! I will diagnose your shooter level by fighting with a boss who gradually gets stronger every time you defeat it! Let's all compete and aim for the heights! Face off against the bosses from DoDonPachi DaiOuJou!

name: Lost in the Amazon
description: Lost in the Amazon is an interactive CD-ROM based on the book of the same name by Toni Brandão, which provides lots of information about the region's indigenous people, animals, and plants. It also includes two games: a matching card game between animals or plants and a Frogger-style where you need to bring items back to the tent.

name: Monsty Corp: The Sequels
description: Two Timelines crossing over. Your actions will impact the future in ways you never could have imagined!

name: Monsty Corp: The Prequels
description: Monsty Corp is an advanced science facility in the middle of the Australian desert, Maria, a new member of the Practical AI Division, has been tasked with activating a new AI called "Sentient Artificial and Intelligent Consciousness".

name: Fantasy Mosaics 37: Spooky Night
description: A nonogram puzzle game about a penguin family who spends the night at an abandoned, spooky manor.

name: Kunio no Nekketsu School Fighters
description: A fan adaptation of beat 'n up game River City Girls, adapted into a 1v1 homebrew fighting game for the Sega Mega Drive / Genesis.

name: Fantasy Mosaics 41: Wizard's Realm
description: Sin descripción

name: Fantasy Mosaics 44: Winter Holiday
description: Sin descripción

name: Fantasy Mosaics 45: Amusement Park
description: Sin descripción

name: Front Edge
description: Front Edge is a real-time strategy game set in a modern warfare setting.

name: Baloo and the Big Blue
description: A flappy bird-style game, but you're a whale who has to deal with being pulled both up and down.

name: Alice's Wonderland: Cast in Shadow
description: Sin descripción

name: FashionVerse
description:
FASHIONVERSE: YOUR GAME. YOUR STYLE
Step into the shoes of a talented stylist in FashionVerse: Fashion Your Way. Create and style your own fashion to become a trendsetter. Dress your avatar in trendy outfits; design your dream closet with unique clothing; create your own designs and submit them to compete against other players in glamorous competitions; pick up challenges, and vote on different designs. Earn rewards for your fashion style and makeovers! FashionVerse: Fashion Your Way is an inclusive social styling game with AI-enhanced 3D visuals that create photorealistic results that allow you to create stunning looks. Fashion in your own way, design backgrounds, shop for great virtual looks, and get recognized for your stylish makeovers with incredible in-game rewards!

name: Laser Quest
description: Rotate pieces, explore different perspectives, and manipulate unique objects to establish a clear laser-beam connection and illuminate the sacred gems.

name: Gem Miner: Dig Deeper
description: Explore a huge mine to find ores, metals and gems and make your fortune. Sell your discoveries to buy upgrades and dig even deeper down. Be careful not to get stuck, fall down chasms or be crushed by rockfalls.

name: Traffix 3D
description: Traffic can create stressful situations, but with this traffic simulator, the effect is the exact opposite: you will feel pleasure simply by tapping and holding your finger on the screen and letting the cars pass through the traffic lights.

name: Amazing Crime Rope Stickman
description: Explore the big city, go off-roading in the mountains, steal and drive supercars, shoot guns and more in this open world game.

name: Guns'n'Glory Zombies
description: The Zombie Apocalypse is here and the dead are rising from their graves. Fire up the chainsaw, refuel the flamethrower and show the rotten monsters that it's a bad idea to shamble into your neighborhood.

name: Little Fox: Bubble Spinner
description: Sin descripción

name: Cafe Panic
description: Sin descripción

name: Grids of Thermometers
description: Fill grids of thermometers with mercury. Numbers on the grid edges tell you how many cells must be filled in each row and column. No random guessing! Many levels to solve with logic only.

name: My Spa Resort
description: Sin descripción

name: Royal Merge!
description: Sin descripción

name: Easter Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: Trog Smash Island
description: The little dinosaur and his friends are trying to escape from an island full of troglodytes. Help them to smash as many trogs as possible, and unleash their hidden power by collecting all the pineapples you find along the way.

name: Reading World VR
description: Step into Reading World VR, where learning to read is all about having fun! Reading World VR is a literacy game that combines fun mini games with reading to help players sharpen their skills. Learn sentence structures, spelling, syllables, and more in a fun new way!

name: The Fixies
description: Sin descripción

name: Cazzarion: Dart Wheel
description: Sin descripción

name: From Four Sides
description: From Four Sides is a game in which you control a yellow square and must dodge flying spikes in four directions. Points are awarded for dodging spikes. The game ends when the spike hits you.

name: Drift Apocalypse
description:
The arcade game where you DRIFT to SURVIVE.
How many zombies can you exterminate before the end of the world?

name: Mario in the Dreamscape
description: Mario follows Bowser into a hectic realm where everyone is being watched...

name: Vigna's Stereo Switch
description:
1-Button Rhythm Game based on 'Arknights', a mobile tower defense game by Hypergryph.

Survive waves of notes vibing to avant-garde music!

name: Letter Boxed
description: Sin descripción

name: On Mount Ségou
description: On Mount Ségou is a short, kinetic visual novel with an atmospheric, dark fantasy story. Ellie and Captain Syna of the Azurium Air Fleet travel to Mount Ségou to offer a prayer to the Nameless One.

name: Cartoon Cartoon Food Bash
description: A Flash game formerly featured on the Cartoon Network website featuring characters from Johnny Bravo, Ed, Edd n Eddy, The Powerpuff Girls, and Samurai Jack.

name: Jinrou Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Kick-the-Can
description: A Flash game formerly featured on Cartoon Network's website in which characters featured on the channel play tag.

name: Vespera_Hotel
description: Welcome to Vespera Hotel! Please observe the precautions on manager's letter and greet our dear guests with your smile.

name: Fire Emblem: Host of the Dark
description: Fire emblem 8 rom hack

name: Bloodroot
description:
A war between the mages and regular humans ended with the regular humans acquiring the power of magic. Despite overcoming this hurdle, they possessed no army capable of beating the mages.
Luckily, the half-blooded witches were able to take down the lord of the mages, allowing the world to reset in peace.

The half-blooded witches of the church used their magic and miracles to dispel the crazed magic that warps the regular humans.
The heroine was one such witch.
One day, she receives information from an old church friend named Yuris regarding a certain underground city, and sets off to explore it.

name: Sonic 3: D.A. Garden Edition
description:
Sonic 3: D.A. Garden Edition is a ROM hack of Sonic 3 & Knuckles created by D.A. Garden. It aims to be a "vanilla" but complete and fully featured take on S3K, with 23 acts of new level layouts matching the scope and size of the original game.

In 2020, a user named Thorn ported the hack to the Sonic 3 AIR project as a mod, allowing it to be played with the additional features AIR provides.

name: Pilapila
description: An indie puzzle game about rearranging blocks to reach your goal.

name: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan: Vol. 4 - Shirasagi ni Aka no Hane
description:
Hello, my name is Masao Ikuo. Thank you for your patience, we are pleased to present
the fourth volume of the detective Ryousuke Kibukawa incident story, ``Crimson Feathers on the White Heron'' .

Do you all remember the meaningful words that Shirasagisu Ituna said during the Kairoukan Incident?

This time, I would like to introduce a sad and heartbreaking incident that she encountered in the past.

Nowadays, with her excellent insight, deductive powers, and outstanding personality,
she is active as a detective assistant, but what happened in her past?

Why did she decide to become a detective?

They will be revealed at the end of the story.

Also, when configuring it as an app this time, we added a little trick.

Suffice it to say... I, 生王は, will not appear in the main story this time.

So, from whose perspective does the story progress?
That will be the key this time.

The story begins with a shocking fact that she reveals in the prologue.

Please enjoy ``Crimson Feathers on the White Heron''.

name: Osmar: A Primeira Fatia do Pão-de-fôrma
description: Have you ever thought about how the first slice of bread feels? That's right, the one nobody eats, the one they always leave aside! That's what you'll discover in this exciting story: Osmar, the first slice of bread, and his friend Cookie are on a mission to find the box of candies.

name: Tarde Animada
description: Join the funniest gang on the Internet and spend an afternoon playing with super cool characters! Tarde Animada mixes an adventure game with various kinds of games. Have fun wandering around the Bugigangue club! Commanding Gustavinho, you meet all the characters, talk to all of them, and choose who you want to play with! It's like spending an afternoon with your Bugigangue friends! Each of them has a different game! You can play target shooting, penalty shootout, cook, mad scientist, and much more!

name: Solely Puzzle
description: Solely Puzzle is a browser based jigsaw puzzle game.

name: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan: Vol. 5 - Kurai Hako no Ue
description:
Immediately after the "Masque of Fantasy Murder Case,'' Renji Mirokuin, a freelance writer who is active in books related to the occult and is a friend of Masao Ikurumi, goes to an apartment in the suburbs for an interview.

The place is commonly known as the "haunted mansion." He was trying to find out about the rumor that was said to have originated from there, "The Red Elevator.''

However, the uncooperative apartment residents refuse to accept Mirokuin's interview ...

As we continue to conduct such difficult interviews , a ``red elevator'' appears in front of
Mirokuin.

Is it the curse of the incident eight years ago? Here is the terrifying story of the encounter between Mirokuin and Hibukawa!

name: Wonderland: Gold Saint In Adventure
description:
Garen, who was in the Twin Wombs of the Holy Kingdom, inexplicably arrived at the mysterious place full of magma when he woke up and also wore a retro knight costume. , is the best thing to do in the future.
Garen exited the Cave of Flames and heard someone calling his name: it was the Cancer Saint, DeathMask. Deathmask was also transported to this strange world when he woke up from his sleep. It was very likely that all the Golden Saints were involved.
The best way to deal with the disease is through a first battle in a different world, Gallon and Dis fought their adventure in the mysterious different world of Fontainebleau. What is the problem? What is the problem? What is the problem?

name: Smash Remix: Shino Patch
description: An unofficial mod for Smash Remix which adds new playable characters: Ryu and Ken from the Street Fighter series and Cloud from Final Fantasy 7.

name: Star Project
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Roll Out
description:
"Super Roll Out" is the exciting debut game from Project8024Games, blending the charm of classic Nintendo 64 and Sega Dreamcast titles with modern gameplay elements.

Take control of Ballu, the determined protagonist on a mission to halt the havoc caused by the nefarious Dr. Marblous. Journey through diverse worlds,

solving puzzles and gathering shattered Mega Gems to restore peace and thwart tyranny. Explore numerous worlds filled with challenges and uncover thrilling mini-games along the way.

Can you rescue the planets from impending destruction and restore order to the cosmos?

name: No Players Online
description: you find an abandoned fps game on an old computer. you decide to play it.

name: Travel to France
description: Travel to France invites you to visit the country of love! Explore the country, see world-famous sights and enjoy the world-class cuisine.

name: Blood Quest
description: Parody on the adventure genre

name: Eternal Paradox
description: Eternal Paradox is a mobile 4X strategy game with turn-based RPG elements. Gather resources, build armies and forge alliances in the player-driven world of Elysium. Compete for rewards within a unique seasonal system where progress is periodically reset.

name: Reydllom
description:
A dark search for an evil witch begins.
Can you survive?

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3-e - Blue Green Switch
description:
The Blue Green Switch is an e-Reader card for use with Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3. It was included in the Series 2 set of cards. Although technically a Power-Up card, it was labeled as a "Game Level" card. It can only be used in the main game.

Once the Blue Green Switch is scanned, grass with turnips below appears all throughout the main game, and Mario can pluck them from the ground and throw them at enemies, just like in Super Mario Bros. 2.

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3-e - Orange Switch
description:
The Orange Switch is an e-Reader card for use with Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3. It was included in the Series 1 set of cards. Although technically a Power-Up card, the Orange Switch is labeled as a "Game Level/New Level" card. It can be used in both the main game and in World-e.

Once the card is scanned, any non-boss enemies that Fire Mario defeats with a fireball will turn into a coin, much like in Super Mario World. Compared to the effects of the other switches from Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3, the effect of the Orange Switch is quite minor.

name: Highlaundry Overwashed: Play with your friends!
description: Wash, dry, and sort clothes against the clock, mastering new challenges with each level.

name: D-Bug
description: Yout task is to fix a computer.

name: Andy Capp
description: The Amstrad CPC version has different sounds, the UI elements are changed a bit and the game is in general displayed in black and white except for icon highlighting.

name: Andy Capp
description: The ZX Spectrum version has a bit different sound, the UI layout is the same as Amstrad CPC but displayed in color, as well as the icon highlight spins through different colors while hovering unlike Amstrad which only had a solid color.

name: Dandy
description: Early dungeon crawler Gauntlet style

name: Pipes
description: You have to find the shortest way to connect several buildings to the water system.

name: Marvel First Alliance 2
description:
Marvel First Alliance 2 is a beat 'em up where you can choose between tons of famous characters from the Marvel universe to lead a fight against the forces of evil led by Red Skull, who is trying to take over the world.

Marvel First Alliance 2 has four different playing modes. In all, you can visit eight different zones divided into more than twenty levels packed full of enemies, including some special bosses.

name: Marvel Infinity War
description:
Adam Warlock warns the earth of the Infinity Stones being sought by Magus, and so earth's heroes divide into teams to collect each Gem. These gems are placed into the possession of The Enchantress, MODOK, Selene, Ronan the Accuser, and Russia's superheroes.

In the end, the gathering of the heroes is what allows Magus to collect them all and try to wipe the floor with them.

Marvel Infinity War is a module created by ZVitor, based on the Marvel Comics Universe, and is a sequel to the Marvel First Alliance series. The game has 80 playable characters plus one secret character. There are also over 36 bosses to contend with. The game uses a six-button control scheme. Each character has at least one special move and an ultra move. There are also many special assist characters to summon.

name: Haven
description: A 2D platforming game with Crowd control elements. Collect and escort citizens across a terrible and dangerous city to the Haven. There they will be safe.

description: Explore the still and calming Grove. Draw music in the air. Each note has it's distinct colour and sound. Make your own calming songs by mixing the Colours and Sound of the Grove.

name: Tripper
description: The game is one long difficult level. Get to the end of the level in the best time you can.

description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3
description: The first released version of Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3 in North America had came bundled with a few e-Reader cards. When the e-Reader was discontinued, this bundle was dropped. This set was never released in Europe.

name: The Punniest Pun Messter
description:
What if you're cursed to make others laugh?

The 'Jester' is an entity who grants children happiness, but he was just another persona of myth... Until one day he appears on your windowsill and bestows his powers upon you. Now you're inflicted with a pun-curse, and thus begins your journey to cure yourself!

Upon changing schools, you meet three boarders who seem to have something to do with your curse...

But little do you know that your curse isn't really what it seems to be...

name: Jest Messter
description: Commercial remaster of "The Punniest Pun Messter".

name: Caixa Mágica de Estórias
description: The Caixa Mágica de Estórias brings you four wonderful stories, written by Lúcia Pimental and Alice Góes, with animated illustrations, soundtrack and narrated text. You'll also have fun with memory games, puzzles, crosswords, and coloring.

name: Elden Ring Reforged
description: ELDEN RING Reforged (ERR) is a mod by Kirnifr and ivi, with assistance from Poeconcept, Hanalove and Cavou. ERR is a thorough revision of ELDEN RING's balance and mechanics. The mod covers enemies, boss fights, hitboxes, animations, equipment, the camera, and more. Main features include unique camera parameters for boss fights, improved enemy hitboxes, reworked scaling and leveling, a new Runeforging system to encourage open world exploration and make NG+ more rewarding, changed gameplay mechanics that fix many of the vanilla game's issues, new Spells and Weapons, and more!

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3
description: The Wal-Mart set for Super Mario Advance 4 includes 5 more cards than the version from other retailers, with 7 cards in total. 5 of them are Power-Up Cards, 1 Level Card and 1 Demo Card.

name: Gyakuten Vocaloid
description:
A very serious crime has taken place in the Vocaloid world and only a top lawyer can find the truth and that lawyer is... wait... Hatsune Miku!?
Exactly! Put yourself in the shoes of Miku to solve the case that looms over the court in this fan-game full of tension and ideal comedy for lovers of Ace Attorney and Vocaloid, discover the truth behind the contradictions in the testimonials and prove that your client is innocent!

name: Wedding Peach
description: A PC98 game based on the anime Wedding Peach.

name: Death Race
description: Death Race is an unlicensed game developed by American Game Cartridges Inc. that was released on the Nintendo Entertainment System in 1990. It was also released by Home Entertainment Suppliers for an Australian release. The game is a remake of the 1976 arcade game by Exidy.

name: 10 Advices
description: 10 Advices is a short atmospheric, 1st-person puzzle platformer about making video games, with precious advice from amazing creators.

name: Junkfood 2: Summertime Slotter
description: Junkfood 2 is a Boom compatible Speedmapping Community Project held in Meowgi's Pacifist Paradise Discord Server which features 83 newly designed slaughter levels; This time, with a summertime theme! The basic premise was to make "Junk Food" slaughter (BFG spammy, high monster count maps) where not a lot of time is spent deliberating about layout/detailing/fight design and other things that can bog a mapper down. It's just good BFG fun.

name: Gentei Shooter
description: Gentei Shooter is a fast paced bullet hell game where defeating a certain enemy can drop weapons. The weapons you can get from a triangle are better than the default shot, but they have limited ammo.

name: Ryudragon
description:
You are in charge of a small Japanese fiefdom. Your goal is to compete for the position of supremacy in feudal Japan, represented by the figure of the Shogun.

To achieve this feat, you must know how to manage your fief, your workers, and your army, and fight together with your clan, in this contest that will involve a lot of strategy to achieve victory...

name: EWar
description: EWar was an unofficial multiplayer version of Grow's tabletop game War.

name: Meteorus: O Universo em Conflito
description: Meteorus is an online multiplayer strategy game set in space. The player is the owner of a planet that they must develop technologically through research and construction, mining resources on the surface and in meteors, assembling a fleet of ships to defend themselves against other players, and, above all, getting involved politically with the universe around them.

name: Watashi Koso ga Gakuen no Joou-sama
description:
What? An otome game where you become a sadistic high school girl and aim to become the queen of the school!?

Yes, it's time for women to be "aggressive" too!!

"Watashi Koso ga Gakuen no Joou-sama" has the heroine take the lead and swing the handsome guys around. It's a ♀＞♂ Romance Simulation Game! !

Whether it’s kabedoning them or pushing them down… "I" will be the one doing all that!!

name: Gunslinger Solitaire
description: Travel the Wild West while earning money as a solitaire cowboy.

name: Dr. Despicable's Dastardly Deeds
description: Make the world a better place, one dastardly deed at a time in this match 3 comedy game that lets you be the mad scientist. Each invention gets more ridiculous and has a twisted purpose that Dr. Despicable and his minions eagerly await.

name: The Hungry Lamb: Traveling in the Late Ming Dynasty
description: A travel text adventure game with Chinese traditional style. Player will escort four girls to Luoyang in order to discover the truth and make decisions along the way. This game involves themes of “Revenge, Cannibalism, etc.” the darker sides of life, but still expect to convey a positive emotion.

name: Bicolor Bird
description: Sin descripción

name: Planisphere 2
description: Planisphere 2 is a replica of New York City.

name: Imp Encounter
description: Based on the infamous fan fiction Impse, Imp Encounter adds in a cutscene based on the story in the middle of the game.

name: Super Monsters Ate My Condo+
description:
Swipe to feed condos to monsters. Match the correct colors together and create combos to pull off insane score streaks. Feed the wrong condos to the wrong monster too many times and they will topple over your tower.

This is a version of the Super Monsters Ate My Condo remake exclusively for Apple Arcade. The microtransactions have been removed, but it requires a subscription to play.

name: Sonder
description: Experience an innovative co-op adventure where two players have to work together. Engage in collaborative puzzle solving and dynamic combat with each player having unique abilities. Delve into a psychological narrative that explores the essence of humanity.

name: Odyssey of the Anachronistic Tome
description: "Odyssey of the Anachronistic Tome" features Patchouli Knowledge who was pulled into a strange, forgotten Gensokyo from a long abandoned canon with the gameplay inspired by the very first Touhou! This is our little alpha build for the Touhou Game Jam 13 with the theme "Retroactive, Retrospective, downright... Retro". Thank you for checking out our game! This is not only the first thing we've ever worked on as a group, but the first game any of us have ever worked on as individuals and with only a 72 hour time budget... sorry if the game explodes lol.

name: Jewel Match Royale
description: Restore magnificent castles in a royal match-3 adventure.

name: Jewel Match Royale 2: Rise of the King
description: Sin descripción

name: Fables Mosaic: Cinderella
description: Experience Cinderella story through logic puzzles!

name: Fables Mosaic: Little Red Riding Hood
description: Help Little Red Riding Hood to bring candies to her Granny! It features a collection of colored puzzles solved by logic, while following the Little Red Riding Hood Story.

name: Fables Mosaic: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
description: Help Snow White to find true love! It features a collection of colored puzzles solved by logic, while following the Snow White Story. Are you ready to solve the puzzles as the story develops?

name: Holiday Jigsaw Easter 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Tiny Circumstance
description: a small rotatable scene, accompanied by a stream of thoughts

name: My Favorite Notification
description: A 5 minute Visual Novel made in Bitsy, about a Discord call between two trans friends.

name: Dash x Survivors
description: Defeat endless hordes of demonic robots in this hack n slash action roguelike. Use 100+ unique upgrades to create your own game-breaking build and claim victory.

name: One Night at Flumpty's 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Heavy Metal Paradroid
description:
Heavy Metal Paradroid is a remastered version of the 1985 game, Paradroid, that started as a graphics test during the development of Morpheus. It was later released with the new graphics style along with the speed improvements added in the Competition Edition.
Its speed is enhanced further on the C128, in C64 mode, as it makes use of the platforms 2mhz mode in some places.

name: Peas! Animated Sudoku
description: In PEAS! Animated Sudoku, dive into a logic challenge where you fill in the rows and columns with adorable animated peas, each with their own distinct emotion and behavior.

name: Champions Arena
description: Champions Arena is a turn-based gacha RPG. Collect unique Champions and engage in real-time turn-based PVP battles!

name: Pinball League: Hardhat Zone
description: Pinball League: HardHat Zone is a 3D pinball game that allows players to experience this classic game in a whole new way. although the construction theme is not as glamorous as it could be and the sound effects tend to lag behind a little, the graphics are highly polished and really help to draw players into the game. the two player mode also helps to ramp up the fun factor by allowing friends to go head to head to see who has the best skills.

name: Le monde d'orathos
description: The elf world wanted to learn creation magic, but the kingdom didn't want it. The king decided to create an island for any inhabitant who wanted to leave, but no return was possible. A young elf wanted to act... He discovered something strange that the king was hiding.

name: Make New Way
description:
Multiple sokoban puzzle!

After reaching the goal, a new puzzle begins using the stage as it is!

name: 10 Lines Princess
description: Developed for the BASIC 10Liner 2023 contest, 10 Lines Princess is a sequel to the already impressive 10 Lines Hero, which was itself an entry to the 2021 edition of the contest. This time, killing enemies changes your color to allow for hazard immunity and more effective healing, among many improvements. The hero saved the princess, but after the hero had been captured, can the princess rescue her savior?

name: Penguin Migrants
description: Sin descripción

name: TerraFirmaCraft
description: "Survival Mode as it should have been." TerraFirmaCraft is a modification for the sandbox survival game Minecraft. The mod aims to overhaul the core gameplay loop, introducing new crafting systems such as metalworking, environmental threats such as seasons & cave-ins, & an overhaul of the geological underground. The mod focuses on "believability" rather than "realism".

name: Shardfall: FitQuest VR
description:
Beautiful Worlds, Endless Enemies, and Unlimited Exploration.
Take on a huge range of fierce enemies with different fighting styles. Attack with powerful jabs, crosses, hooks and uppercuts. Defend yourself with blocks, jumps, ducks and dodges. Think and adapt to survive.

name: Firey's Candy Bar Adventure
description: Firey's Candy Bar Adventure is the first game released based on the Battle For Dream Island series, predating the show itself. However, the game is incomplete and is not currently being worked on.

name: Trompers
description: You have to catch aliens falling from their spaceships.

name: 3x9 Kingdom: Road of Adventures
description:
Playing as Oleg or Olga, you will go on an exciting journey into a 3x9 Kingdom to help the kids return home.

During the story, you will meet many characters of Russian folklore, such as The Gorynych Snake, Baba Yaga, The Mermaid, Chernomor, and many others. Some creatures will need your help, while others will try their best to keep the kids in the 3x9 Kingdom.

name: Rat Hotel
description: You have to watch out for Waldo, thr rat catcher, while you roam the hotel for some cheese.

name: Star Wars: Deathtroopers
description: Star Wars: Death Troopers is a FPS/3rd person action adventure video game. It is a game based on the novels Death Troopers and Red Harvest, both written by author Joe Schreiber. The game is divided into: Story Mode, Onslaught Mode and Multiplayer.

name: Dungeon Party
description: Sin descripción

name: Shaman's Mask of the Rune Magic
description: Sin descripción

name: Kitty Patrol: Paw Showtime
description: Discover the adventures of this patrol of adventurous kittens who will have to save the world together.

name: Party Games
description: Introducing the "Party Games" bundle - the ultimate collection for unforgettable moments with family and friends!

name: Superscout
description: "Superscout" is a live-action interactive movie game where you will unravel the secrets of the girls you meet. The love beyond lifetimes, never let it go; the kindness in this life, engraved in your soul. Your choices will change your loved ones’ fate; those who love you will change yours...

name: Dark Hunting Ground
description: "Dark Hunting Ground" is a minimalist style of pixel construction brush treasure game. As a new member of the Hunter Association, players will hunt monsters against the void, gain trophies and experience in battles, and challenge the source of void erosion with your unique construction ideas.

name: Leaving The Hospital
description: A difficult to control horizontal plate escape game, players control patients to escape from the hospital, the game has a difficult control system, the game includes two-person cooperation and two-person racing mode, hope to bring you some joy.

name: Koishi Adventure
description: Koishi Adventure is a 2D top-down slash-and-shoot Touhou Project doujin RPG, where you'll be adventuring in the absurd and brutal world of Lotusland from the perspective of the Komeiji Koishi~ In the game, you can explore dungeons, collect equipments, and constantly strengthen your party~

name: Touhou Female Fist Mutation
description: The game is a combat AVG game that combines male awakening concepts with Eastern project themes.

name: Absolute Fear: Aooni
description:
20 years after the birth of the legendary horror game "AOONI"...
A completely new first-person, 3D horror stealth action "Absolute Fear -AOONI-" is now available!

name: Pack Everything You Can
description: Go through puzzles that bug your brain to collect all the necessary products, making you understand why no one is working there. There will be old rooms with fragile floors, metal detectors to prevent you from reaching some places, locked doors, and many other challenges. Are you ready?

name: Party Party Time 2: Party Hustle Pack
description: It's time to party hustle! Introducing 10 new minigames!

name: Tower Defense: Infinite War - Infinite Starter Package
description: This content requires the base game Tower Defense: Infinite War on Steam in order to play.

name: Pixel Puzzles Traditional Jigsaws: Chihuahuas
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Uncle's Basement: Collector's pack
description: The DLC adds 22 items to be found. Find all the items, you will get the achievement in the main game.

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?: Tintin Pack
description: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: Tintin

name: Bounty Drag Racing: Outlaw Pack 4
description: This Outlaw Pack includes (2) Outlaw type vehicles, with slick and wheelie bars, and Radial tire versions of these vehicles with no Wheelie bars.

name: WWE 2K24: Nightmare Family Pack
description: The Nightmare Family Pack features ‘76 Dusty Rhodes, ‘Superstar' Billy Graham, and Stardust, with an exclusive MyFACTION Mattel ‘Defining Moments' Bruised Cody Rhodes action figure with Gold MyFACTION card, ‘76 Rhodes MyFACTION card, and Pharaoh Manager card.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: SA CL Class - SSR Pack 01
description: The CLF and CLP Classes were rebuilt as 3,300hp locomotives, with an EMD V16-645E3C engine in the 1990s. This pack features four CLF and CLP locomotives operated by Southern Shorthaul Railroad; these being CLF1 (SSR Yellow/Black), CLF3 (Primer white), CLP9 (Auscision) and CLP12 (Primer white).

name: RocketRecoil
description: Change the past by propelling yourself towards the future. Or something like that. Just blow yourself up with rockets to move around. The game's hard to play.

name: PicoTrains
description: A retro-styled railway management strategy game!

name: Mereonozis 2D: The Kingdom of Gremlins
description: A puzzle-bazed metroidvania. Help the robot to repair the station. But there are gremlins who will try to break everything you've just fixed!

name: Minotauros
description: Minotauros is a single-player horror game that lets you experience the challenge faced by the hero Theseus. Explore, fight or flee when the Minotaur finds you. You're both hunter and prey. Find the secrets of the labyrinth to win.

name: Nine Realms: Dawn Touch
description: Rule the god of thunder and challenge all the gods of the nine realms! In this Rogue-like, hack and slash game, develop your strategy and skills, subject all the gods who challenge you to your wrath, and become the only god of the universe.

name: The Croaker
description: A 2D platformer with tons of features, including a level editor, level sharing, XP, and leaderboards!

name: Starpoly
description: Discover strategic depth in our space board game! Use star-currency to buy interstellar sites. Compete with friends in turn-based matches, utilizing the Starbridge for tactical advantage. Accumulate currency for the Lottery, offering rewards and site boosts. Achieve cosmic success

name: Topac Battle
description: Topac Battle is a cozy and relaxing idle game. Buy Topacs and Level them up, trade for a higher rarity, and become the master of the chill battle scene. Customize your Park as you progress from a simple park to your dream setup with rare exotic monster and ultra-rare color variants!

name: Amelie And The Lost Spirit
description: Dive into the intense "Amelie And The Lost Spirit," a single-player action game set in a horror environment. Help Amelie find her way out of the witch's realm. Seek help from your Ghost friends as you try to escape the witch's clutches to your freedom.

name: Lullaby in Dreams
description: An adventure game project for children. A cave-in in a dungeon begins an adventure in an unknown land, for some an isekai, for the others an adventure in search of answers.

name: Mother's Sword
description: Make your way through a ruined world with Metroidvania elements, unleash fast and powerful attacks with your sword, face fearsome enemies in difficult combat. Take a breath, be brave and learn the whereabouts of the sword you possess.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: Jeep RAM Remastered
description: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021 - Jeep | RAM Remastered DLC includes 6 cars: 2016 Ram 1500 Yellow Sport - 2013 Ram 3500 - 2012 Jeep Grand Cherokee SRT8 - 2012 Jeep Wrangler - 1949 Jeep Willys Civilian - 1942 Jeep Willys Military - V8 HEMI 345 - V8 HEMI 392 - V6 Pentastar G - I4 WIlys L134

name: VR Harem Sex: Mai DLC
description: Immersive harem experience in VR space! High functionality and freedom with lesbian play, cross-sectional views, big tits/poor tits, and more!

name: Ubersoldier
description: Get ready for an epic World War II adventure like no other with UberSoldier! Immerse yourself in a gripping first-person shooter that will transport you to the heart of the action. This game developed by Burut Creative Team will have you on the edge of your seat.

name: Kakuriyo
description: Sin descripción

name: Flint's Hints
description: Flint's Hints is an escape-room-like puzzle game where you investigate your surroundings to appease your fussy pet cat, Flint. Search for hints to figure out what he wants and how to give it to him, but be careful with what you investigate. Some things are meant to be left alone and forgotten...

name: Run Run Bird!
description: Embark on a whimsical journey into the enchanting world of our beloved animal friends with "Run Run Bird!"

name: Recycle it!
description: In "Recycle it!", you embark on an exhilarating journey as a bold bottle with an insatiable curiosity, daring to explore the vast expanse of the house while its inhabitants are absent.

name: BlockArena
description: BlockArena is a rogue-lite action game where the player must survive the enemies and defeat them by parrying their attacks. Player can unlock new shields with unique traits and skills. Pick a shield and create your own unique build each run and conquer the BlockArena!

name: Zombie Parkour Apocalypse
description: Zombie Parkour apocalypse is FPS action game with mini open world game where you and your friends have to survive

name: Sticky Clicker!
description: A thrilling clicking adventure!

name: Solis
description: Elio is a boy who deals with reality through imagination. He finds himself trapped in a dark dungeon mirroring his thoughts. This wordless puzzle platformer tells a story through memory shards. Only by gathering them, he hopes to break free.

name: Is This A Platformer?
description: Play a fast paced action platformer where you fight grapes and a banana to save your dump brother.

name: Aidan in Danger
description: Aidan in Danger is a retro-style 2D platform game. The player takes on the role of Aidan, the guardian of the last dragon. Face challenging levels, menacing creatures, and an interdimensional villain, all while enjoying beautiful graphics and an exciting soundtrack.

name: Finding Sparky
description: 'Finding Sparky' is game in which an extremely ordinary boy, Tom, goes on an adventure across a haunted village to retrieve his kidnapped dog. With Tom, defeat the ghosts and (a slightly big) animal friends to get to the bottom of the case and find out what the hell dog kidnapper really wan

name: Postrok
description: Unleash your inner warrior in this unique roguelite odyssey. Experience explosive quests, leverage the mystic powers of Bifrospheres, uncover potent Runes, and maintain your Hugr in a chaotic, post-Ragnarok realm.

name: Carnival
description: Carnival is a first-person horror game that immerses you in a cursed amusement park. Explore eerie attractions, solve puzzles, confront bosses, and upgrade your arsenal. Uncover the secrets of the Sterling family amidst relentless darkness.

name: Jumplife
description: Jumplife is a minimalistic platformer with lots of wall jumping and wall sliding.

name: Cubic Enigma
description: Immerse yourself in the fascinating ancient world of cube puzzles, where each step reveals a new mystery. You will explore different zones, each filled with unique puzzles that require the use of cubes to solve them.

name: Fujisan Nobori
description: Embark on an adventure to find out the reason for the appearance of monsters on Mt. Fuji. "Fujisan Nobori" is a game where you defeat boss monsters on each floor and ascend towards the summit. Be the first in your country to reach the summit.

name: Bitmagic
description: Imagine games — Use Bitmagic’s new text-to-game platform to bring your game ideas to life. Instantly.

name: Jötunnslayer: Hordes of Hel
description: Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel is a gripping roguelike horde-survivor game set in the dark realms of Norse Mythology. Fight waves of enemies to earn divine blessings of ancient Norse Gods, explore hostile worlds and face powerful bosses. Become a god-like warrior in this ultimate showdown.

name: White Path
description: Addictive and difficult, combining precise jumping and mental endurance. Explore this universe with double jump, dash, dilemmes, choices, 3d and 2d. Each level is unique, for an unforgetable experience.

name: Ramen Oil Simulator
description: Use the mouse to drag and move the oil droplets, aiming to gather the floating oil into a cluster.

name: JDM: Rise of the Scorpion
description: Experience the automotive culture of Japan with a free prologue to Japanese Drift Master. Learn about the story of the rebellious high schooler Hatori and race through the winding roads at Haikama Lake. Discover the places where drift was born!

name: Thorns: Police never sleeps
description: Thorns. Police never sleeps is a kinetic visual novel about an alternative future. After global warming, cities were separated by a giant ocean. Our story begins in one of these cities.

name: Rise of Industry 2
description: Navigate the competitive industrial landscape of vibrant 1980's USA! Make strategic manufacturing decisions, optimize production chains, acquire technologies, and expand your global business network with key contacts. Opportunities await those savvy enough to capitalize on them!

name: Blood On The Dusty Trail
description: In this thrilling audio book, we follow the story of Caleb, a young outlaw who finds himself on the run after a robbery. As he navigates the dangers of the Wild West, his gang of outlaws plan their get away.

name: Mochi Sprint
description: You have become a "Mochi". A perfectly round Mochi. Navigate through 2D scrolling dungeons, avoiding brutal traps, and aim for the goal (mortar). That's all there is to the game.

name: Hot Pot Game
description: Hot pot game is a cute merge puzzle game with high replay value. Keep up a merge streak for getting helpful items. Utilize a variety of unique items and cook the best hot pot ever.

name: Stellfire
description: Action Third-Person Open World shooter set on the derelict space base, deploy as a powerful fire-racing unit and conquer strength with Weapon founds across unique locations, destroy everything on your way to get through rageous enemies, as well as monstrous bosses waiting to be discovered.

name: Onychomp: Lush Journey
description: Meet the moon at the highest floor before the night is over in this high speed, roguelike dungeon crawler. Become the werewolf rat and chomp on every creature in your path, even a vampire serpent.

name: Minesweeper
description: Classic, Hex, 3D or Endless! Want to play Minesweeper to pass the time? Play the classic original or try some new unique takes on it!

name: Police Station Simulator
description: You’re in charge of a run-down police station. Will you manage to restore it to its former glory? Arm yourself with some coffee and donuts, because there's a lot of renovation and micro-management work to do!

name: Evergreen: The Board Game
description: A tree-growing abstract strategy game where you make your planet the greenest and most fertile of all!

name: A Day in the Palace
description: Travel to Poland in 1772, experience life as a servant, and solve a mystery at court!

name: Miko in Maguma
description: Operate Hololive's VTuber "Mikochi" and aim to escape from magma! But there are ''35p'' and ''Holomem'' trying to prevent you from going home! ? If you make a mistake, you might have to start from the beginning!? This is a vertical scrolling action game that is very difficult but somewhat addictive.

name: PizzaPanic
description: People are starving for Pizza! Become our new delivery operator. Race through the city with Nip, your trusty courier bot, and bring joy to your customers. Customize your robot and experiment with dozens of unique skills and upgrades. Bring your friends and enjoy chaos in 4 players local-multiplayer.

name: PMC Promiscuity
description: We are proudly bringing the artwork and world of Shuuko's original monster-girls to life in our first exciting and lust-filled erotic visual novel!

name: Egggg
description: This is a simple game where all you need to do is control an egg to jump and climb high mountains to return to its nest. Trust me, most people will complete this challenge in a relaxed and pleasant mood.

name: Dinosaur Island
description: Players need to survive on an island filled with dinosaurs and other dangerous creatures.

name: Find Eden
description: In this cute adventure game you play as Timmy, who was magically teleported into the realm of cats. Unravel the mystery of Eden and awaken the fighting spirit of the felines. You solve puzzles, defeat monsters, upgrade new powers, all while meeting quirky cats in a classic hand-drawn 2D style.

name: Yandere Institute Dating Simulator
description: Yandere flash game by chibixi

name: Shui's Odyssey
description: This is a puzzle game that combines text and images. Players use visual illusions to piece together fragments of memories from Alzheimer's patients, in order to reconstruct the truth of the story and witness the passage of time for three generations.

name: Minigames Mayhem
description: Minigames Mayhem is a fun collection of minigames, that can bring joy for players not only in single-player but also with friends in your living room or across vast distances. Try to beat the high scores, compete with others, and bring mayhem on other players in many simple but fun games!

name: Idle Hero TD
description: Endless idle tower defense game full of deep strategy and combat mechanics. Unlock and upgrade dozens of epic fantasy heroes to defeat an infinite swarm of enemy monsters. Strategize hero placements, synergies, and skills for an effective defense, then sit back and let the auto-battler do its thing!

name: Combat Cat
description: A fast-paced, side-scrolling, bullet hell with an inventory system where a player can upgrade their weapons and player stats to survive as long as possible.

name: Circus Challenge
description: Many people are afraid of clowns, but what scares the clowns? Dive into a nightmare world where you will face many risks in the ring. Be careful with every step you take and overcome obstacles to escape from your nightmare.

name: The Dilemma
description: When you open your eyes in a dark labyrinth, what should you do? Find the right path and escape from this labyrinth!

name: Redlight
description: Redlight is a chilling multiplayer first-person horror experience. Traverse a liminal maze alongside friends while being hunted by a relentless AI-driven terror lurking in the shadows. Work together to activate generators, but remember: survival demands stealth when the lights turn red.

name: Zeta Wave Infinity
description:
Enjoy in this adrenalinic arcade game with the beatiful AI pilots named
ZETA and OMEGA

name: Ninpaw
description: Enter the arena and fight your friends in local multiplayer combat. Play as cute cats, master your skills and play through game modes to reign supreme over your opponents.

name: Tiny Ski
description: Welcome to Tiny Ski Resort! Where pixel art, skiing, multiplayer races, and a beautiful story all come together.

name: Dark Investigation
description: Maybe you like to explore the park up and down, or explore the depths of the underground sea where there is no water, only chrome! Do you want to control huge demons? Or do you want to become a god to the local creatures!CONTROL UNIVERSE, TIME, CREATURES, GODS AND OTHER.

name: Broadvay
description: Welcome to BROADVAY! BROADVAY is an online platform where you can hold live performances and events with your own avatar. Communicate with your fans through various interactions and support your virtual idols with BROADVAY's own donations!

name: Taco Terror
description: TACO TERROR is a boomer shooter set in a cyberpunk future where capitalism rules everyone - except for you. Run, gun, choke, dive, jump(?), and slide your way through the forces of T.A.C.O. Take back New TACO City from these forces of fried evil before you become too... delicious.

name: Sift Heads Cartels
description: Embark on a thrilling trilogy as Vinnie, Kiro, and Shorty battle urban gangsters and the Italian mafia. Upgrade weapons, immerse in a bloody tale, and enjoy enhanced gameplay features. Fight, upgrade, and chase your targets in this action-packed adventure!

name: Dale & Dawson Stationery Supplies
description: Navigate office intrigue in Dale & Dawson Stationery Supplies! Complete tasks, uncover the carrier of illegal leads, and outsmart coworkers in this strategic multiplayer game set in an early 2000s office.

name: The Old Gentleman
description: Use Morse Code to communicate with your crewmate and ward off a stalking monster in this short point-and-click horror game.

name: Street Race Kings
description: You are brought into a racing league, the SRK. Once you can qualify and prove yourself to the league, you then make your way to the top, racing against various competitors, and taking down stage bosses to move up in rank! Multiple vehicles, customization, open world maps, and more!

name: Run Dungeon
description: Run Dungeon combines the heart-pounding action of an endless runner combined with the strategic depth of an RPG. An infinite dungeon full of monsters, loot, traps, spells, and bosses awaits you.

name: Kidnapped
description: Kidnapping, The most vicious crime against children. If your family member was kidnapped, would you be able to rescue your child from the event, or even survive it from a demonic clown? Good luck, and make sure you survive. Kill to not die, that's the most important thing you have to do.

name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 7 - Collector's Edition
description: AviGames presents the seventh game in the hidden object series of "Big Adventure: Trip to Europe". Embark on a journey through beautiful European countries and look for hidden objects in old Europe and Scandinavia, play exciting mini-games and collect souvenirs from different countries.

name: Jetrunner
description: Jetrunner is an action packed parkour first person shooter set in a crazy sci-fi future.

name: Distant Isles
description: Distant Isles is a party-based RPG with roguelike features. Stranded on a procedurally-generated island you will gather party members, explore and fight creatures in search of hidden treasures.

name: A Storm Unsung
description: An action roguelite with a multitude of unlockable characters. Challenge procedural dungeons generated by an AI Dungeon Master who controls the pace of combat and the frequency of random events.

name: Super Blockbuster
description: Super Blockbuster is a retro action-puzzle game. Kick blocks to solve tricky puzzles and take on a diverse cast of enemies, all in gorgeous pixel art, inspired by the golden age of 2D puzzle games.

name: Try to Wake Up : The Legend of Trevis
description: Legend has it that if you fall into a deep sleep while your body struggles to survive, Trevis will welcome your soul into his labyrinth. If you want to wake up, take a good look around and don't overlook any anomalies...

name: Shoko
description: Capture and battle hundreds of different monsters to complete your bestiary. Shoko is a game with waves of enemies to defeat and Roguelite elements in a cute, colorful, hand-drawn universe.

name: Trivia Trials
description: It's about Trial and Error. Show your resilience by passing all 20 random Questions and Riddles before your Time runs out, or admit to your weakness and surrender. It's your choice. Do you have what it takes?

name: Viridian
description: A journalist is trapped in a terrifying technological box of illusions where he is on a journey to discover the truth behind his family's darkest secrets.

name: Unnatural Selection
description: Four Player Party-Shooter Featuring Cute Animals Wielding Wacky Guns! Play as animals and fight your friends to win the tournament, eliminating the most players to win the round!

name: Rivers of Chaos
description: Conquer the galaxy in this cinematic, battle-simulator. Each playthrough offering a completely unique galaxy, over 100 total specialized ships to command, and distinct commanders to lead your people. Pick your favorite faction and lead your forces into a dynamically generated battlefield.

name: Aston
description: The aim of the game is to find the passwords of the encrypted doors in the rooms and finish the game.

name: Necrophobia
description: Start your life anew at Heaven's Gates Academy. Learn new subjects, make new friends, experience what you've never before deemed possible. Change your fate, and the fate of those around you- your decisions matter greatly.

name: Cellular Survival
description: Cellular Survival is an action shooter with heavy Rogue-like elements. Choose your path, equip yourself, and push forward and overcome the perils that stand in the way of your survival. The fate of the microscopic realm rests in your hands.

name: Scaredy Cat
description: Henny has been worn-to-the-bone by a soulsucking corporate career that has gifted her with heart problems. After she rage quits and starts pet sitting, she discovers her new gig will be just as horrifying as her last.

name: Ember Point
description: Ember Point is a red-hot, combat-focused, third-person action game. Play as a disgraced defector, Gravitus, from a militaristic mega-corporation. He is stuck cleaning up the mess his former employers left behind — all while wielding a top secret “cure” for a gruesome disease.

name: Fall Words
description: Fall Words is a challenging physics puzzle game that has you type letters to drop them and collect all the asterisks. Letters have different shapes and physics and based on that there are various mechanics in the game: bridge, domino, hanging, rolling, and more! Try it now and see how words fall!

name: Mutant Football League 2
description:
Mutant Football League 2 is an over-the-top, arcade-style football game packed with thrills, strategy, and unrelenting action. Created by the original designer of Mutant League Football and Mutant League Hockey, MFL2 takes brutal gridiron battles to the next level, delivering deep strategic 8-on-8 gameplay, bone-crunching hits, and outrageous mutants that parody your favorite players.

Prepare yourself for the most brutal football experience ever. Step into diabolical arenas filled with deadly traps, where victory isn’t just about scoring points – it’s about survival. Win the traditional way by outscoring your opponent or force a forfeit by racking up a body count that leaves the opposition in shambles. Outwit, cheat, and dominate your way to victory in the most chaotic, carnage-filled football game yet. Whether you're a die-hard sports fan or just looking for wild, unpredictable fun, MFL2 delivers an experience like no other.

name: Advancing Chess
description: Experience the beloved game of chess in ways never before seen! Starting with just your King and a Pawn, you’ll strategically assemble your board with pieces of your choice. But be warned, you’ll be facing off against boards uniquely crafted by other players, there’s no telling what to expect!

name: Temples vs. Buildings
description: Temples vs Buildings is a roguelike with shoot'em up elements. The player will control flying temples of many cultures and fight against a vast array of flying buildings.

name: Robo Pose
description: Robo Pose is a difficult game about Robot that needs to strike the right Pose in order to overcome procedurally generated obstacles.

name: Jupiter Junkworks
description: Fast paced arcade puzzle action awaits you in Jupiter Junkworks! Complete arcade puzzle contracts to earn resources while rebuilding and upgrading a ruined spaceship junkyard. All set in a sci-fi narrative campaign mode where you'll join an unlikely trio of travellers as they overcome challenges.

name: Highway Gas Gas
description: Buckle up tight, boss, because we've got the boys in blue hot on our tail!

name: CloudStudy
description: An online study room shared by players around the world. Those who work hard for their dreams are welcome to join.

name: Swords & Bones 4
description: The fourth installment of Swords & Bones immerses you in a new fantasy adventure, with pixel art in a side-scrolling action-platformer style. In this latest chapter, harness the power of magic to emerge victorious!

name: Spaced Out
description: Retro, classic, couch-buddy competition in space! Simple controls make it easy for friends and family to join in the fun!

name: Spellbrew Express
description: Low wages, high adventure – every delivery is a magical struggle. Bounce, blast, and cast through treacherous ruins and vibrant forests in this movement-based 2D platformer. That goblin brew atop the mountain won't deliver itself. Time is money— get moving!

name: Multiplayer Spiders
description: Multiplayer Spiders - You and Your steam spider friends must stop the invading spiders from spinning their web of fear.

name: Whelm
description: A mysterious island has fallen into disrepair and only you can save it. Rescue animals, replant seeds and repair machines. We're counting on you, young penguin.

name: Desert Of The Undead New Frontiers
description: Slaughter the undead to save your town in this 8 bit action run-n-gun

name: Fio Fizhook
description: A colorful first person game about a made-up sport. Throw an anchor, hook peculiar fish and punch them through ramps and turns!

name: Vindefiant
description: A disgruntled employee is fired from his job, sparking a path of rage and destruction. Lead Alyx through his journey of vengeance and creatively kill enemies in this pixel-art adventure where you, are the villain.

name: Enemy Metal
description: 2.5D Roguelite Shooter with Unique Gameplay, Powerful Weapons and a Killer Soundtrack. Battle the dangerous enemies and defend the planets of the Sunstar System! Gather crystals and destroy turrets to level up and unlock exciting new Starships on each planet!

name: Last Ride
description: A Train Ride to ... where exactly? A short atmospheric Horror Game about an unusual Train Ride where you need to find your way through a Train to see what lies behind.

name: Dodge Barrage
description: Dodge Barrage is a chaotic sports-fighting game, where you’ll need quick reflexes and aggressive plays to take down your opponents. Play with up to four players either locally or online.

name: Truth Universally Acknowledged
description: It is a truth universally acknowledged that a teenage boy in possession of a fine life must be in want of a boyfriend.

name: MistsBook
description: "MistsBook" is a deck-building roguelite game where automatic chain reactions form the core gameplay. where you can play all the cards you draw with just one button press. You will collect patterns, symbols, and seals to uncover clues and reveal the pages of this book that has no beginning or end.

name: Pearl Fishery: Quest for the Mega Pearl
description: Shoot pearls, fire harpoons, and collect treasure under the mysterious "Pearl Island" in this new single-player, ocean-themed coin pusher game!

name: Safebreaker
description: Take on the role of a safebreaker who must break as many codes as possible to safes located in a closed bank. There is not much time left. Using your skills and hearing, you must decipher as many access codes to bank safes as possible and finally get to the large vault, where the main prize awaits.

name: The Citizen
description: The Citizen is a very short first person exploration game about learning to be a good citizen featuring an overly talkative person who doesn’t really like you.

name: Yandere Simulator: Midori Adventure - The Visual Novel
description: Yandere visual novel fan game.

name: Rusted Sea
description: Earth's surface has been dessimated by radiation from The War. The only remaining safe havens are found under the seas. Now you must cook, craft, and survive alone in your submarine, delivering vital supplies to the Starving Survivors - all while battling monsters both real and imagined.

name: Midnight Cruise
description: As you progress, you'll need to find keys and open locked doors. Solve puzzles and find passages. A first-person game with elements of horror. Explore the ship and its cabins, collect batteries for your flashlight. Ability to use the camera Solve puzzles. The darkness can conceal various secrets.

name: Brave Quest
description: This is an adventure RPG with a focus on boss battles, defeating powerful enemies and gaining lots of equipment rewards. With different equipment to enhance yourself, challenge more powerful bosses and uncover the secrets of this fantasy world.

name: Brave Legacy
description: This is an adventure RPG with a focus on boss battles, defeating powerful enemies and gaining lots of equipment rewards. With different equipment to enhance yourself, challenge more powerful bosses and uncover the secrets of this fantasy world.

name: Full Speed Animals: Disorder
description: Let's escape from this planet by car? Fly in the sky with a sparrow? Can you run with a cheetah? Or... Customize your character by entering the pit during the game! "I have to use my skills! Gosh!!" "I'm so excited! I'm back!!" "What is that? A UFO!!" "Something is chasing me from behind!!"

name: Beyond Galaxyland
description: Take to the stars in the retro-futuristic adventure-RPG, Beyond Galaxyland! Spanning the very cosmos, join Doug and his plucky, gun-toting guinea pig, Boom Boom, on an exhilarating, planet-hopping journey to save Earth itself.

name: Boring Movies
description: Challenge your friends to identify famous movies based on your most boring possible description of the plot! Can you stump them or are your friends actual true cinema fanatics that can name Citizen Kane from the most minute detail?

name: Syon
description: A 2D horror to find and repel anomalies. Light the lantern of the girl and the ability of the ghost to fight back.

name: Sinister Hospital
description: In the dark forests of Duskwood town, an abandoned hospital rises ominously. Despite its closure years ago, "Sinister Hospital" harbors terrifying secrets. The player enters to follow the trail of a group of lost children from the town. There lies a dark journey and quest for justice: Judge Harlan.

name: WC Dream
description: You are the KING of your own throne, capable of creating anything you desire. YOU are the KING!

name: Cringegolf
description: If you think playing golf is easy, then try playing Cringegolf! Your nerves will be tested, and your composure will be questioned.

name: Kolt Penny's Symmetris
description: Match the pieces! Grow that multiplier! Get that high score!

name: CyberTaxi: Lunatic Nights
description: CyberTaxi Lunatic Nights is a free roam taxi driving simulator set in a dark-noir Prison City. As a cab driver you have to find your wrongfully accused sister and rescue her from this dystopian city-facility. Complete unique missions, defeat lurking thugs and maintain your fuel level to succeed!

name: Scarecrow vs. Big Butt Birds
description: Defend crops as a scarecrow with a hand-tapped gun. Aim carefully against plump, persistent birds. Enjoy tacos in this quirky simulator!

name: The Collection
description: A First person, Short story indie horror game with an immersive atmosphere.

name: Epic Pixel War
description: An action roguelike where you send armies of powerful units with different powers to fight against hordes of enemies, upgrading and finding new units as you go.

name: Cold VR
description: COLD VR It's the non-stop VR experience. With its twisting mechanics, this game will turn you into an unstoppable machine as you adapt and overcome challenges in each level, you are in control of time. Every time you stop, time flows; you move, it slows down. So, keep on moving!

name: Quadbots: The Rise of Chrono
description: Embark on a cosmic quest to retrieve shattered NOVANGEL orbs, conquer colossal guardians, and ultimately defeat Chrono. Dive into an action-packed adventure with epic battles and a gripping storyline.

name: Early Mellow
description: A short walking sim game where after a car crash you wander into strange lands. Chop some cactus and turn an old mill into a concert hall. That's your life now.

name: Chaos Islands
description: Chaos Islands is a city-builder that unites deck-building and tower defense mechanics with roguelite elements. As the last bastion of humanity forced to escape to the skies to hide from invading forces of demons. Protect your settlement and do not let the evil forces pass.

name: Odd Sequence
description: Odd Sequence is an indie-action game with armed bots and RPG elements in platformer gameplay. Geometric characters and a flat, minimalist art style give this game its uniqueness. Odd Sequence focuses heavily on the combat aspect and the attack customization.

name: Feed
description: A top-down survival horror, where you must fight your way through a mysterious mansion, surviving it's crazed inhabitants.

name: Tiny Planet
description: Create your very own tiny planet and place it among the stars in the vast expanse of the universe !

name: StarsKnight
description: This is a game that constantly iterates and updates. Before the final version, different gameplay will be updated to get through the iteration period. The final iteration of the game's main mode will be a galactic demon city game with a big map and a big story background!

name: Exit Slum 11
description: Exit Slum 11 is an anomaly observation running simulator with an eerie atmosphere.

name: SuperEat Man
description: After 6 years of self-exile, food delivery hero SuperEat Man returns to Pepper City to fight for his redemption and honor against him and his father's nemesis in this "stunt 'n gun" third-person shooter.

name: Rebellion Against Rebellion
description: Dive into the indie MMORPG, Rebellion Against Rebellion! Embark on a magical journey in a world of enchantment, shaped by mystical crystals. Acquire magical abilities, collect characters, and pets on epic adventures! Join now for an uplifting, enchanting experience!

name: Super Puzzled Cat
description: Help Puzzled Cat use jetpacks, portals, bombs, gum, and more to conquer treacherous platforming stages. Play your own way using save states to explore a world full of challenges and secrets - but can you find the way through? Travel through time and space and reach enlightenment.

name: Stickman Browser
description: Play the stickman fight in the browser! Destroying all Website Elements! Like what we all have imagined when we are a child!

name: Cats Balance
description: Balance the cats and don't let them fall into the water in this 2D physics puzzler.

name: Cats Around Us: Giant Cat
description: We've hidden numerous cats in a silent comic about a giant cat causing chaos in a village. Can you find all those cats?

name: Interrogator
description: A text-based, interrogation-centered puzzle game with text and voice as the main inputs. Each of the 18 cases is a self-contained mystery for you to solve. It is up to you to eradicate crime in the tri-state area once and for all.

name: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan: Vol. 6 - Tsuikou Saku Jiken
description:
The 6th installment of the popular mystery game “Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan Series”!

At the request of Detective Otonari, Ituna unravels a past serial murder case.

Masao Ikuo is asked by a client at a detective agency to find someone.

Two incidents that happened to two people. parallel and intersecting. What awaits at the end is a surprising truth.

name: Car Repair
description: Car Repair - go back in time to Poland of the 90's. Run your own car repair shop. Look for savings wherever you can. Make lots of money and avoid angry customers!

name: Silva
description: Silva is a platform and action game, with elements of RogueLike, which brings a lot of action and dynamic gameplay, where we will bring you a mix of ancient cultural elements with Brazilian history in a playful way.

name: Keep Up
description: Keep Up is a cute-as-heck 3D platformer! Explore giant worlds freely and reach new heights! In this action game, you will control a small dog with various jumping skills. Keep going up and find the path to the top.

name: Reborn: Dragona PH
description: This enhanced version aims to captivate and enthrall potential players by highlighting the captivating elements and challenges offered by Reborn: Dragona PH.

name: The Mara Witch
description: "The Mara Witch" invites players to embark on an unforgettable journey deep into the heart of Africa. Assume the role of Leboo, a young Maasai warrior navigating a landscape fraught with tragedy, betrayal, and mystical encounters.

name: Kick'n Hell
description: Kick'n Hell is a retro style 3D precision platformer where you traverse the nine circles of hell as a martial artist and kick filthy demons! Do you have what it takes to escape and show Satan who's boss? Take on the ultimate test and show us what you got!

name: House of Horrors
description: Lost in the woods, you seek refuge in a desolate mansion. Big mistake. Now you're trapped with bloodthirsty maniacs and ravenous cannibals. Fight for your life, solve chilling mysteries, and escape this house of horrors before you become dinner.

name: Hide And Seek
description: 'Hide And Seek' is a game where you collect items to escape the house that has been merged with the school you went to and turned into a complicated maze. Escape the randomly generated house and win the bet!

name: Drums Rock: Battle Beast - 'King for a Day'
description: Get the track 'King for a Day' from Battle Beast! This track is part of the 'Power Metal Music Pack'.

name: Drums Rock: Blind Guardian - 'Blood Of The Elves'
description: Get the track 'Blood Of The Elves' from Blind Guardian! This track is part of the 'Power Metal Music Pack'.

name: Drums Rock: NorthTale - 'Higher'
description: Get the track 'Higher' from NorthTale! This track is part of the 'Power Metal Music Pack'.

name: Drums Rock: Fifth Angel - 'When Angels Kill'
description: Get the track 'When Angels Kill' from Fifth Angel! This track is part of the 'Power Metal Music Pack'.

name: Drums Rock: HammerFall - 'Hearts On Fire'
description: Get the track 'Hearts On Fire' from HammerFall! This track is part of the 'Power Metal Music Pack'.

name: Drums Rock: Twilight Force - 'Twilight Force'
